content: Would tenure-track job announcements be appropriate, somewhere on this Zulip? If so, where?
I would just post them in a new thread on general
It is easy for people to mute a thread of they don't like it. (I might be biased, but I think many people are interested in these announcements)
If they become too much, we can create a dedicated stream.
We would all be happy if the flood of tenure-track job announcements became overwhelming!
